import React ,{useState}from 'react' export default function MainPage() { // states for the four field const [date, setDate] = useState(null); const [sourceCurrency, setSourceCurrency] = useState(""); const [targetCureency, setTargetCurrency] = useState(""); const [amountInSourceCurrency, setAmountInSourceCurrency] = useState(null); const [amountInTargetCurrency, setAmountInTargetCurrency] = useState(null); return

Convert Your Currencies Today

CurrencyConvert is a versatile currency exchange app designed for travelers, shoppers, and professionals. It offers real-time exchange rates, historical data, and offline mode, providing accurate and hassle-free currency conversions. With a user-friendly interface and multi-currency support, it helps users make informed financial decisions globally.

}
